Presisent Barrack Obama

A little history of barrack obama

Barract obama was born in august 4, 1961,is an American politician and attorney who served as the 44th president
of the United States from 2009 to 2017. A member of the Democratic Party, Obama was the first
African-American president of the United States.
He previously served as a U.S. senator from Illinois from 2005 to 2008 and as an Illinois state senator from 1997 to 2004.
